TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content: Granted, but because it seems already corrupt, you get a nice lovely ice cream sandwich...

CYANIDE Flavoured ice cream sandwich (although it actually contains morphine (a lot of it).

Have a nice day!!

The granting fairy smites you.

I wish there was some thread tape lying around here!

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy stuffs it in your mouth, and you choke to death.

I wish Shna_na didn't choke to death.

Granted. Shna_na goes unconcious, and wakes up in the hospital after being placed on an Iron Lung.

I wish for a hug!

Granted. You are hugged for eternity.

I wish for a fuel duct

Granted, but the fuel is bees.

I wish that everyone knew the absolute fact that if anything moves it will turn into bees.

Granted. It isn't true.

I wish the 700th page of this thread started with "Granted, but".

Granted, but the thread gets shut down on page 699.

Me gustarÃƒÂ­a hablar espaÃƒÂ±ol. (That means: I wish to speak Spanish)

granted, you learn spanish but you lose your tongue in the process

i wish that i had an Oculus Rift

It turns into bees.

I wish that blue.

Granted. You are blue (da ba dee da ba die)

I wish I wasn't 100% pure unadulterated EEEVVVVIIIIIIIILLLLLLLLLLLLol.

Granted, you are now a 100% dirty evil.

I for an empty fuel tank

Granted, but the fuel tank is that empty that is sucks in the whole universe... including you

I wish that Jeb wouldn't forget to pack the parachutes

granted, he sticks holes in them by accident

i wish that i was as good at flying as mechjeb

Granted. You are seen as a cheaty sort of pilot and are frowned upon by the less-mod friendly pilots.

I wish I had some Gardettos right now.

Granted. You are sued for having delicious snacks.

I wish my ear was a rae instead.

Granted. Your ear is a death rae and fires at your brain.

I wish for ALL the wishes!

Granted. You only made wishes that directly caused negative consequences.

I wish I could wish, JoeMama took all the wishes away from me.

Granted. You only made wishes that directly caused negative consequences.

I wish I could wish, JoeMama took all the wishes away from me.

Granted. However, for inexplicable reasons, you wished for your eyelids to turn to sandpaper. OUCH!

I wish to go to Mars.

Granted. You are lucky enough to have a space burial, where you requested that your remains are sent to Mars.

I wish to be more combustible than semi-combustible...

Granted. You burn. Forever.

I wish I had a competent pit crew for my racing rover.

Granted. They get temporarily swapped out with other incompetent kerbals because they are hurt, and the rover loses a tire and has to drive back to base.

I wish that the bee joke never came across this place.

Granted. It is replaced by something worse.

(I honestly don't know what the bee joke is.)

I wish I knew the bee joke.

Granted. It is bees. You know bees. Bees.

I wish that Night Vale wasn't real. I so desperately wish that. Help.
